entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
